<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"> <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <access>public</access> <active>true</active> <api_name>global.DictionaryAttributeHelper</api_name> <caller_access/> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <description/> <name>DictionaryAttributeHelper</name> <script><![CDATA[var DictionaryAttributeHelper = Class.create(); DictionaryAttributeHelper.prototype = { initialize: function() { },
set: function(table, element, attributeName, attributeValue) { SNC.DictionaryAttribute.set(table, element, attributeName, attributeValue); },
type: 'DictionaryAttributeHelper' };]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2019-04-23 17:40:54</sys_created_on> <sys_id>5dce44707341330078e83cf2c4f6a70b</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>DictionaryAttributeHelper</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Agile Development 2.0" source="com.snc.sdlc.agile.2.0">c2159f242fc10110d8a4d5f62799b627</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_5dce44707341330078e83cf2c4f6a70b</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2019-04-23 17:53:27</sys_updated_on> <u_script_length>313</u_script_length> </sys_script_include> </record_update>
